title: Capcom heard you like fighting dinosaurs more than actual players in Exoprimal, and they're on it
description: The full version of Exoprimal will have a purely PvE competitive mode, but probably not at launch.

title: Star Wars Outlaws devs say they want to nail that Han Solo 'scoundrel fantasy'
description: Nerf herders rejoice.

title: All the Starfield companions and crewmates we've seen so far
description: Bethesda has said you won't be short for help on this ship; here's who you can recruit to the crew.

title: Monkey Island creator Ron Gilbert wasn't involved with the Sea of Thieves DLC: 'Happened behind my back'
description: Gilbert said he was told about the upcoming expansion but had no chance to be "meaningfully involved" with its development

title: Is there a game you love despite absolutely sucking at it?
description: Dishing on our favorite games where we never found the time to "git gud."

title: Microsoft exec says Starfield has 'the fewest bugs any Bethesda game ever shipped with'
description: A bold statement that the head of Xbox Studios will probably hear repeated back to him once or twice.

title: Eagle-eyed dataminer reveals a potential fifth difficulty option in Diablo 4
description: World Tier 4 might not be the highest difficulty setting.

title: Assassin's Creed Mirage's hero is looking a little OP... what with all the teleporting he does
description: We got a look at some of Basim's moves, and I don't think his enemies have a chance. 'Cuz he can teleport?

title: Diablo 3's 'Hidden Camp' has been discovered in Diablo 4
description: The once-thriving settlement is stashed away in the desert, but it's definitely seen better days.

title: BioWare celebrates Mass Effect's greatest moment with a $135 statue: That time Shepard died in the cold hard vacuum of space
description: As a Dragon Age tat buyer, I'm slightly judging you, Mass Effect folks.

description: If a videogame patch falls in the forest, does it make a sound? Arkane is about to find out.

title: 3 years after he faced sexual harassment allegations, new fighting game Diesel Legacy is giving disgraced Skullgirls developer Mike Zaimont a chance to prove he's now 'fundamentally different'
description: We spoke with the devs behind Diesel Legacy and Zaimont's former coworkers about his past behavior and return to games.

title: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown may not be the game you were hoping for, but trust me, it's the one you need
description: Ubisoft is going back to Prince of Persia's roots with a modern twist.

title: Star Wars Outlaws looks like the best thing Ubisoft has made in years
description: Jedi: Survivor is cool and all, but I'm so glad Outlaws has a proper sandbox.

title: Ubisoft's Skull and Bones sea shanty was this year's best gaming showcase musical performance
description: But will Skull and Bones itself be good? Well, TBD...

title: Intel asks for more money to build its German megafab, government says nein
description: Intel's plant would be the biggest foreign investment in postwar Germany.

description: It so delicate and adorable, but it's not available in the US.

title: 'Killable horse found': This innocent Diablo 4 stallion is the final target for its worst achievement

description: It looks like FromSoftware are carrying on their tradition of keeping quiet after a big announcement

title: 7,178 subreddits and counting have gone dark today in protest of a 3rd-party app pricing calamity
